title: Walmart OP Gaming Laptop Review
description: My review of the $999 OP Gaming Laptop from Walmart Better options: Dell G5 -  HP Pavillion -  ASUS FX504 -  Helios 300 -  Asus STRIX -   The GTX 1050 isn't enough to carry the 144 Hz Screen. A GTX 1060 option is better but is still not a great value.  Full Review of this chassis -   Background Music: Fili - The Break  If you want to support the channel, consider a Dave2D membership by clicking the Join button above!      Purchases made from store links may give me some money.  (It doesnt cost you extra, so please buy everything)
